title.bibl: Svornost, Oct. 7, 1884. Our Countryman Mr. Schlesinger Is Elected.

div.bibl: Svornost, Oct. 7, 1884. OUR COUNTRYMAN MR. SCHLESINGER IS ELECTED.

body.p: The Bohemian candidate for State Representative is elected. Yesterday the lists from the last two precincts were counted and this decided the election between Schlesinger and Meyers. The report from the book of the Election Supervisor shows that Schlesinger had 6,835 votes and Meyers 5,994 votes. His election mainly depended on the Bohemians. We have proved that we are able to unite and to fight valiantly for our countryman, who as a result emerged victorious.
